inclusion.criterion: approached until 100 of them signs the Informed Consent Form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Potential risk to the subjects: The research will not influence rehabilitation of the patients.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Pt is a 22yo F otherwise healthy with a 5 yr history of systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
